name: Dark-Instagram by Vednoc
description: Complete, dark and light, very customizable userstyle for Instagram.

user.name: Vednoc
user.about: Hi! I am Vednoc, but people mostly call me Mew. Making website themes is one of the things that I absolutely love doing, so I decided to share them with the world.

additional_info: Updated on 24th of September, 2020. Changelog and more info available at GitHub.
